idp_mesh_info_v2.lang_idp_mesh_confirm_title: 请按住子节点的WPS按钮3秒钟
idp_mesh_info_v2.lang_idp_mesh_fail_title: Connecting to your child node took to longer than expected. Try again.

idp_mesh_info_v2.lang_idp_mesh_plug_content1: 等待便捷的网状网络设备完全启动。大约需要 3 分钟。
idp_mesh_info_v2.lang_idp_mesh_plug_content2: 如果要设置更多的子节点，务必一次设置一个，以免出现问题。
